column4: I'm trying to figure out how much space to put in partitions. Anyone, know where MYSQL puts things?
Ok, if I give /var a separate partition (web, MysqL) and separate home what's a comfortable level to leave for / ? Right now I've got a 15 G / that uses only 1.6 GB.
I've got a 5 gig partition for ubuntu and am only using half
